name: Red pickup - Free
description:
Point and click game with one hand scratching your head. Load and unload easy right? But if you load the truck too much, you will be stranded in the middle of town with petrol stop. But do not worry, it's just to try it again, and again, and again ...

Free version, NO pay to win. All features for free, NO accidental "in-app purchases".

How to play:
Press the steering wheel to drive there.
You load and drop automatically.

Thanks and attribution to:
